generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by sidewalks and buildings.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on both sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and poles.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, featuring brick and plaster facades.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those supporting streetlights and traffic signs.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are present, including a blue parking sign and a yellow directional sign.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are visible along the street and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person wearing a red jacket is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible, including a black car in front and a silver car parked on the left.
- bus: A red bus with headlights on is visible in the distance, approaching the camera.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the right side of the road, near the black car.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road, near the person in the red jacket.
